EmailTemplate.name: March Emails 2018.Spring Microsoft-Azure 3-6-18
EmailTemplate.subject: 4/12/18 Webinar: Java Is Great … on Microsoft Azure? See Newest Tools For Spring Boot Developers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar, Java Is Great … on Microsoft Azure? See Newest Tools For Spring Boot Developers <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-12-java-is-great-on-microsoft-azure-see-newest-tools-for-spring-boot-developers-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=webinars&utm_campaign=msft-azure-pcf&utm_term=q218]]>, on April 12, 2018.
We get it. You think of Microsoft Azure as the place to run your .NET applications. Microsoft and Pivotal have worked hard to make sure that Spring Boot applications get a first-class experience too.
From new Spring Boot starters to handy Visual Studio Code extensions, Microsoft is making it easier to build cloud-ready Spring Boot apps. And whether those are functions, streaming apps, or web apps, Microsoft offers runtime support.
Join Richard from Pivotal and Asir from Microsoft as they walk through all the exciting product updates. They’ll demonstrate the latest tooling, and show off running apps in both Microsoft Azure and Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) atop Azure.
Presenters: Richard Seroter, Pivotal Asir Vedamuthu Selvasingh, Microsoft
Date: Thursday, April 12, 2018 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-12-java-is-great-on-microsoft-azure-see-newest-tools-for-spring-boot-developers-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=webinars&utm_campaign=msft-azure-pcf&utm_term=q218]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
